titleStmt.title: The dolefull fall of Andrew Sall, a Jesuit of the fourth vow, from the Roman Catholick apostolick faith lamented by his constant frind, with an open rebuking of his imbracing the confession, contained in the XXXIX Articles of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: French, Nicholas, 1604-1678.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Nicholas French, R.C. Bishop of Ferns. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
